nodes.text: An ancient terentatek was imprisoned within Vault S-31 on the Rakatan prison planet of Belsavis during the reign of the Infinite Empire. The terentatek would eventually be awakened in the aftermath of the Sith Empire's attack on the planet thousands of years later, and the Imperial officer Executor Krannus left the Republic scientist Doctor Gantrell at the mercy of the beast after the man was no longer useful. The terentatek was killed, however, when the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython rescued the doctor.
